main.name: Emre Cosar
main.description: 5+ years experience about software development with interest in many aspects of building software.
main.bio: 5+ experience about software development with interest in many aspects of building software. Senior Software Engineer in YapÄ± Kredi Technology. Currently, working about micro-service architectures with React, Spring Boot and Spring Cloud using the TDD approach and CI/CD. Formerly full stack web and mobile(Android / iOS and backend) engineer. Strong and eager about Java and JavaScript. Clean coder and open-source committer! Loves to build software solutions that makes a difference and/or add value. To achieve that, especially pays attention to code quality and to the process (whether the right tools and frameworks are used in the project for optimal result). Has strong communication skills and he is goal oriented.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Bachelor's Thesis is Ontology based issue tracking systems entegration. Common and general ontology will be designed and modelled for understanding different issue tracking systems and running in between. Also common tools and algorithms will be used for inferencing and generating graphical visualisation.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: As a Senior Software Engineer, developing new technologies and frameworks for FinTech Ecosystem. Currently working on micro services architectures with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud. Using TDD approach for unit/integration and cloud tests. Sticks with clean code principles.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: As a Senior Software Engineer, worked as a part of Web Technologies & Social Media Applications Department. Maintained www.garanti.com.tr public site and made a mobile version of it. Created Twitter and Facebook web applications that bank's customers use and enrolled campaigns over Facebook and twitter. Also he was a part of team that created iGaranti web and mobile applications. Developed Google Glass application for iGaranti mobile application. Created new products and platforms for our customers to touch in so many ways. In every level of application development process; designing the architecture, creating web and backend level.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked as an intern at Netz in Poland and 3 month working with CRM based company, NETZ. My first business experience was about java based desktop applications and three different Android applications about viewing CRM document and tracking customer-cargo locations.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
